description: Advanced research project undertaken within the University, or in an industry setting with co-supervision by an academic staff member. The course will develop advanced skills in practical research and experience of the formulation and testing of a hypothesis. Students will complete a project on a topic relevant to the student's field of study. Students completing the course over two semesters must enrol in BIOT7021 if commencing in sem 1 and BIOT7022 if commencing in sem 2.. Students completing the course in a single semester must enrol in BIOT7020.
